name: Oh Sheep!: Baaaa (itch)
description:
"Embark on the fantastic world of Oh Sheep!, a slapstick cartoon-style action game where you'll encounter crazy enemies. Sheep will be your salvation."

 

Placidie, a young woman in her twenties, is living in a small settlement where its inhabitants harvest and breed the local fauna. But a purple sheep will have changed Placidie's life forever. Transported to a place with more than exotic life, returning to her family will be her sole purpose. With the help of a mysterious shepherd's staff's abilities, she will obtain the support of sheep who will be her comrades, but above all, her weapons to navigate and face the dangers of this insane world. 

  • Fight through a crazy, colorful universe, accentuated by comics visuals effects and delirious animals.
  • Use your herd of sheep to fight enemies by either throwing them or make them charge.
  • Don't forget that you can use them to improve your movements. Experience a story rich in action and visuals, mixing humor and intrigue.

Minimum System requirements tested : 

  • OS: Windows 10 Family
  • Processor: Intel® i3-5005u 2GHz (4CPUs)
  • Memory: 4Go
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520
  • DirectX®: 12
  • Hard Drive: 3 Go
  • Controller Support: Microsoft Xbox 360 controller

We're French students at ETPA Rennes who are doing this game as a study project for our Bachelor. We're releasing a demo of our game as there are several reasons for this : This would be our first game published on Steam. It's a good way to show our skills. Getting feedback and knowing if the game brings interest will mean of lot for us!
